text: Ryan O'Neal's Son Patrick Says He's Planning a 'Celebration of Life' to Honor His Late Dad: 'Will Be Amazing' Ryan O'Neal died at age 82 on Dec. 8 of ‚Äúcongestive heart failure,‚Äù according to a death certificate obtained by PEOPLE [Ryan O'Neal](https://people.com/ryan-oneal-life-in-photos-8413775)'s son [Patrick O'Neal](https://people.com/ryan-o-neal-remembered-hollywood-legend-full-stop-son-patrick-8413810) plans to memorialize his father after his [death at 82](https://people.com/ryan-o-neal-academy-award-nominated-love-story-star-dead-at-82-8413764). Days after the Love Story actor was [buried next to his longtime partner](https://people.com/ryan-oneal-buried-next-to-farrah-fawcett-in-los-angeles-8420197) [Farrah Fawcett](https://people.com/tag/farrah-fawcett/) in Los Angeles, Patrick shared an image to "Everyone who should be there will be there and it will be amazing, trust me. üî•," Patrick wrote. "This will be a tribute to the man, his family, his love of boxing, and his legendary career as an actor. I have my work cut out for me because Ryan took about 3 million photos and saved 700 thousand of them ü•∫" Photos of Ryan's burial service published by [The Daily Mail](https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-12897215/Ryan-ONeal-buried-longtime-lover-Farrah-Fawcett-Love-Story-actor-farewelled-intimate-ceremony-Los-Angeles-ex-wife-Leigh-Taylor-Young-son-Patrick-death-82.html) showed Patrick in attendance at Pierce Brothers Westwood Village Memorial Park & Mortuary for the ceremony. Ryan's ex-wife Leigh Taylor-Young and actress Alana Stewart, a friend of Fawcett's, were also present. Related: [Ryan O'Neal Dead: Actor Reflected on Love Story's 50th Anniversary with Ali MacGraw in 2021 PEOPLE Interview](https://people.com/ryan-o-neal-dead-read-his-2021-people-interview-with-ali-macgraw-8413884) Patrick announced his father's death on Dec. 8, when he shared on "He is a Hollywood legend. Full stop," Patrick wrote at the time. He also shared a photo of a beach at sunset on his Instagram Story on Christmas Day as he wrote, "1st Christmas without my dad. Prayers up. We miss you." Ryan is also survived by his two children from his marriage to Joanna Moore: [Tatum O‚ÄôNeal](https://people.com/tag/tatum-oneal/) and Griffin O‚ÄôNeal; and his son with Fawcett: Redmond James Fawcett O‚ÄôNeal. After Ryan's death, his daughter and Paper Moon costar [Tatum honored her dad in a statement to PEOPLE](https://people.com/tatum-oneal-speaks-out-about-late-father-ryan-oneal-death-8413778).
